        public boolean isTileSelected()

      • setLayers

        public void setLayers(java.util.List<TileLayerModel> layers)
        Sets the layer of the tile associated to this controller
        Parameters:
        layers - The list of layer models to set for the currently active tile Note: An empty list is acceptable when resetting the layers of the currently active tile
